text: These are the list of personnel changes in the NBA from the 1975–76 NBA season. ==Events== If you want to see the transaction events (from July 10, 1975 to June 30, 1976), see the links below ==References== *NBA Transactions at NBA.com *1975-76 NBA Transactions| Basketball-Reference.com Transactions Category:NBA transactions
title: List of 1975–76 NBA season transactions
